data.name: Pickleball
data.description:
Pickleball is the fastest growing sport in the USA and this is its top simulator. Experience cutting dinks, outrageous rallies and pickup games with AI Bots and friends around the world.
State-of-the-art configurable custom physics, makes VR Pickleball feel like the real thing. Use your real-life forehand, backhand, and volley moves in the game - unlocking more creativity, and a better workout along the way. 
This app includes:
- Configurable AI Bots for Singles and Doubles, Stationary Ball machine, Moving Ball machine, Practice Wall and several drills
- Competitive multiplayer against real players from around the world.
-Several Ball types, Paddle types and Court types
-Several Bot Avatars
- Ambidextrous play
-Customizable physics: Arcade, Simcade and Simulation modes 
-Customizable paddle size, paddle sensitivity, paddle friction, ball bounce, ball friction, etc.
-Support for paddle grip adapters.
-Instant Replay with playback trail
-Instant Analytics
-Configurable options like displaying fault trajectory on the fly, ball landing position, ball trail, collision animation, ball orb, custom background tracks etc.
- A variety of immersive environments to explore.
-Mixed reality
- In-game leaderboard where you can compete to be a star. 
- Fully localized in following 27 languages with text and audio

Tech support contacts:
Facebook -https://www.facebook.com/groups/vrpickleball/
Discord - https://discord.gg/gHZCUSPuRE
Email - viniotstudios@gmail.com

changelog.change_log: Add tooltips to menu buttons
Update rewards logic. Written review and points are needed to unlock drills without Pro purchase.
Bugfix matchmaking button text on Enable
Update multiplayer tiles
Increase size of minimize icon on practice menu panel
Debug menu tab initialization
Update menu and start experience.
Add buttons to minimize leaderboard and multiplayer menus
Bugfix invite friend not showing accept invite buttons
Update review lock icon dimensions. Make center line thicker. Add news items.

Add avatar names. Randomize Maria Avatar automatically. Add slider to adjust autorun max speed. Freeze ball on grip is now only available with Instant Replay checkbox is turned on in ball settings. Increased the range of lift assistance slider to 2.
Add preset for SolidSlime Pickleball Quest 3 grip adapter
Bugfix Adjust Grip UX enablement
Bugfix sliders in player tab. Increase max ball speed.

Simplified custom grip settings. There are no sliders any more. Select Custom Grip from dropdown. Turn on "Adjust grip" switch on the UX and press grip button on the paddle hand to adjust the controllers position with respect to the paddle. When you release the grip button the setting gets saved as custom setting. Turn off the  Adjust Grip UX switch. The custom setting will be remembered by the app. You can customize grip to support any adapter with new interface.
Add fruits, lightsaber and boxing gloves to paddle ball game
Added paddle yaw slider and button to reset paddle position.

Improve physics with more advanced lift assistance. Add more filtering to reduce impact of tracking errors. Add feature to freeze the ball in flight by pressing grip during bot play. Bug fix ball deflecting by hitting player before it hits the paddle during backhand. Further limit lob height for playing with 8 ft ceiling.

Add Top Spin Pro feature to freeze the ball to watch the spin. Hold down the grip button while hitting the ball to freeze its location upon hit and release the grip button to unfreeze it. Update Paddle orientation in Paddle Ball game. Bugfixes in shot manager. Limit height of Bot Lobs.
Limit lob height.
